name: Candle Guy
description:
• Overview •

This is my submission for the third Blackthornprod game jam themed: "Less is more". The game revolves around a candleholder which needs to escape the dungeon while keeping it's candle burning. This is my first attempt on developing a puzzle game, so forgive me if the levels lack depth or are too simple.

•How is it "less or more"?•
The less candle wax you have, the more obstacle  is present.

• Credits •
Everything is made by me. 
Here are the tools that I used:
Art - Aseprite
 Game Engine - Unity 3D
 Sound Effects - BFXR
 Music - BoscaCeoil

Due to time constraints, I wasn't able to create more levels. To combat this, I decided to make the final level have 2 endings. One for casual play and another for extra challenge. The easy one can be accessed by just hitting all the switches/pressure plates. The harder one can only be accessed by covering the entire level with wax.

Thank you for playing!
